Articles.Content:
So once, I made a Mission to Duna called Operation DERP.

Duna Exploration Rover Platform... In smaller terms... a Rover. The Lifter I used for it was my "PEGASUS II" Lifter... one of the most unstable launchers I have ever built. In total it took 27 Launches to exit the Atmosphere, an EXTRA 12 Launches to get into orbit and out of Kerbins' orbit. Yes, every other time, it blew up. So I decided to make a little video about this tale.

Oh did I also forget to mention, It took 3 attempts to land it too? Thanks to Ike, I was flung into Duna almost 3 times the speed I wanted.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mKokwP0J8Xk

(Link to video if you wish to see it)
Since this is a video, the thread has been slipped on over to the video sub-forum. May it flourish there.
